name: Altair Vest, Black and Brown
description: The Altair vest has a sleeveless design and fitted for the skilled Larp rogue. This larp tunic give a slim appearance, sharp lines giving you a dangerous look. Rest assured that your identity will be concealed as you move around the city streets and hide amongst the crowd.

name: Altair Vest, Green and Beige
description: This sleeveless vest seems to have been fitted for an Elf. This elegant two tone surcoat has a unique design to slim your appearance giving you a taller, more statuesque look. This is the proper attire to wear if you want to be able to fight and look amazing doing it.

name: Tristan Vest, Black
description: The black Tristan Vest is a beautiful light cotton doublet that fits well with any period attire. This vest looks awesome when worn over any fencing shirt but can be worn alone as a type of muscle shirt. It’s simplistic design works well at any medieval or renaissance event.

name: Tristan Vest, Blue
description: The Blue Tristan Vest is a wonderful soft cotton doublet which fits nicely with virtually any medieval outfit . This vest style stunning when placed over a fencing shirt however it may be worn alone as a sort of muscle shirt . It’s straightforward design and style is appropriate at virtually any historical or renaissance occasion .

name: Tristan Vest, Dryad Green
description: The Green Tristan Vest is a beautiful light cotton doublet which fits well with any medieval outfit. This vest style stunning when worn over a fencing shirt but it may be worn alone as a sort of muscle shirt. It’ simplistic design and style is appropriate at virtually any medieval or renaissance occasion.

name: Dorian Vest, Black
description: The Dorian larp vest can be adapted to fit in most any era. Similar to any aristocratic coat it is lined in a beautiful satin giving it just enough panache to make a dramatic impression. This sleeveless larp coat puts the bling into larping.

name: Dorian Vest, Grey
description: The Dorian larp vest can be adapted to fit in most any era. Similar to any aristocratic coat it is lined in a beautiful satin giving it just enough panache to make a dramatic impression. This sleeveless larp coat puts the bling into larping.
